pgrid.core.maintenance.identity
Class IdentityManager

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.core.maintenance.identity.IdentityManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
TypeHandler
public class IdentityManager
extends Object
implements TypeHandler

This class represents the GUID manager to map GUIDs of peers to current IP addresses and ports.

Version:
1.0.0 todo: port this manager to the new architecture
Author:
Roman Schmidt

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

IdentityManager

protected IdentityManager()
The constructor must be protected to ensure that only subclasses can call it and that only one instance can ever get created. A client that tries to instantiate PGridP2P directly will get an error at compile-time.

Method Detail

sharedInstance

public static IdentityManager sharedInstance()
This creates the only instance of this class. This differs from the C++ standard implementation by Gamma et.al. since Java ensures the order of static initialization at runtime.

Returns:
the shared instance of this class.
See Also:
Lazy instantiation - Balancing performance and resource usage

stale

public boolean stale(PGridHost host)
This method should be called when a host is stale. Some decision may be taken depending on the maintenance policy.

Parameters:
host - stale host
Returns:
true if the routing table has been updated

handleUpdate

public boolean handleUpdate(DataItem item)
This method handle the update of an ID - IP mMapping. It check if it knows the item to update and if the signature is correct. If everything is correct it perform the update.

See Also:
DataTypeHandler.handleUpdate(pgrid.DataItem)

Parameters:
host - to challenge
Returns:
true is host has succeeded.

submitSearchLowerBoundValue

public String submitSearchLowerBoundValue(Query query)
Construct the string out of the lowerbound that will be use to query the network.
For exemple, if you have a lowerbound equals to "Key=Value" you could return "ValueKey" as the effective search string. The lower bound will be inlcuded in the query, but the lower bound used for the searching will be the return value of this method.

If you want to search with the lower bound, either return null or the lower bound

Specified by:
submitSearchLowerBoundValue in interface TypeHandler
Parameters:
query - the query being processed.
Returns:
a string use to perform the search

submitSearchHigherBoundValue

public String submitSearchHigherBoundValue(Query query)
Construct the string out of the higherbound that will be use to query the network.
For exemple, if you have a higherbound equals to "Key=Value" you could return "ValueKey" as the effective search string. The higher bound will be inlcuded in the query, but the higher bound used for the searching will be the return value of this method.

If you want to search with the higher bound, either return null or the lower bound

Specified by:
submitSearchHigherBoundValue in interface TypeHandler
Parameters:
query - the query being processed.
Returns:
a string use to perform the search
